name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Reported on October 17, Shenyang. Anchor Li Moumou said that he bought a batch of Chinese cultural relics lost overseas in Southeast Asia, but he offended a mysterious Japanese family and was hunted down. He was unable to bring the antiques back to China. Li Moumou used the slogan of "protecting China" to ask for help. Patriotic fans buy the antiques and recycle them at a high price when they return home. After investigation, the police found that the antiques he sold were actually cheap handicrafts. Li Moumou and his accomplices made illegal profits of more than 700,000 yuan, and are currently under criminal detention.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 16, Japanese media reported that 28-year-old Chinese man Wu Bingquan was arrested by the police. On December 1 last year, he went to a private school in Arakawa District, Tokyo, and took out a pair of female students' leather shoes from the shoe cabinet, sprinkled his body fluids on the shoes, and then threw the shoes nearby and left. The police found him through the camera, and during the interrogation, he confessed, "I like women's shoes."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 17, it was reported that my country's population has experienced negative growth, and a new round of sampling survey on population and family development has been launched: a comprehensive analysis of the reasons why people do not want to have children or dare not have children will be conducted. Netizens responded, "Because they are poor, they cannot afford to have children," "Debts, no house, no savings, no stable income"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Under the news that Hamas leader Sinwar was shot dead, some Chinese netizens mourned him in the comment section

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the afternoon of October 17, Xi Jinping conducted research in Tongcheng City, Anqing City, Anhui Province, and also visited Liuchixiang.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to a report on October 18, an insider disclosed to the Yomiuri Shimbun that the perpetrator of the attack on a Japanese boy in Shenzhen said that he was "angry because he had difficulty finding a job and wanted to do something big." "I thought if I did something big, I would get attention. If I stabbed a Japanese person, the response would be huge and there would be people supporting me. I found the Japanese school online."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, the internet celebrity "Ding Pangzi Lecturer" released a video, sharing that he not only got a student ID card for an adult school in the United States, but also received a YouTube badge for 100,000 followers. Not only that, he also moved into a government-allocated house.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Israel released the last footage of former Hamas leader Sinwar before his death. Before he died, he threw a wooden stick in his hand to drive away a drone.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Reported on October 17, Baoshan, Yunnan. A video of a 4-year-old boy encouraging his cancer-fighting mother to get well soon in a baby voice makes people cry. On the 17th, the child's father, Mr. Yang, issued an obituary saying that his wife died on the 17th at the age of 30.
Mr. Yang said that his wife was diagnosed with gallbladder cancer in August last year, and had two major operations and 13 chemotherapy sessions in a year. In order to treat the disease, he borrowed money from relatives and friends, and the family sold everything they could, but in the end he failed to keep his wife.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, the North Korean Labor News released photos of "people's anger", denouncing the invasion of South Korean drones into Pyongyang. The people in the photos were so angry that they gnashed their teeth after seeing the news about the incident.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, JD.com invited talk show actor Meng Chuan to be a guest in JD.com's live broadcast room, which aroused the anger of netizens. Many netizens accused Meng Chuan of being a Hong Kong separatist and supporting the White Paper Revolution during the epidemic, so he was once again "whipped" by netizens. It is reported that Meng Chuan once posted on Weibo on November 27, 2022, "I hope my soft spot can become as hard as the Southern Tradition children", and then his Weibo was banned by the platform.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 18, CCTV released the last footage of former Hamas leader Sinwar before his death. Many netizens commented on the video, "Salute the hero" and "Justice can never be ended." Another netizen said, "Insulting the martyrs will lead to jail time. I have taken a screenshot and reported it to the police. If you make fun of Sinwar, just wait to go to jail."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 18, according to South Korean intelligence agencies, North Korea has decided to send four brigades of special forces soldiers to Russia to participate in the war, with a total of 12,000 people. The first batch of 1,500 soldiers has arrived in Russia and is expected to be deployed to the Russian-Ukrainian front after conducting adaptive training.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, when a 24-year graduate was communicating with a company, the other party replied that "we do not accept fresh graduates from the epidemic class." The person in charge of the company stated: Employers generally have a bad evaluation of fresh graduates from the epidemic class. The reason is that they have taken more online classes during the three years of the epidemic and their attention is not focused. In this regard, many fresh graduates said that the three years of the epidemic were not their fault, so why should they take the blame for it? Some netizens also said that they were volunteers on the front line during the epidemic, but they abandoned us after the epidemic.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 17, Tangshan, Hebei. A woman posted a video saying that her nephew was poked in the buttocks with a badminton racket by a teacher at Jinqiao School, causing the whole class to laugh. The child also had bruises all over his body and was afraid to go to school. However, some parents supported Teacher Li in the parent group, saying that the teacher was very responsible and that "children in their rebellious period lack a responsible teacher to take care of them."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Follow-up on the case of the sub-landlord in Hangzhou running away with the money: As of the evening of October 18, a total of 69 households were registered, with a total amount of 2.02 million yuan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to statistics from the Ministry of Education, from 2022 to 2023, the number of kindergartens nationwide decreased by 14,800, and the number of children in kindergartens dropped significantly.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to China Business News, an insider of Nezha Auto said that they had received the September salary on the afternoon of the 16th, which was only one day later than the agreed payday on the 15th. Previously, the salary was paid on time.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The number of Chinese illegal immigrants seized by the United States this year hit a new high. On October 17, the United States announced that following the first charter repatriation operation in June, it would send a second repatriation flight on October 15 to deport Chinese illegal immigrants back to China. However, the U.S. Department of Homeland Security did not disclose the number of Chinese illegal immigrants deported this time.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: It is reported that the owners of Shanghai Beihuating requested to return the house because the building design was unreasonable and the quality was reduced. The facade was uneven, the equipment platform and windows of the side set of Building No. 1 were misplaced, and there were serious discrepancies between the actual structure of the house and the design drawings. There were flaws in the design and construction, and the placement of the air conditioner outdoor unit in the middle of the high-rise building was risky. The quality of the garage was visibly perfunctory, not only inconsistent with the renderings, but also seriously lower than the quality of the same price building in the same period.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The state-owned enterprise responded that the employee had been found and was qualified for the job after training, and that direct dismissal was illegal.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Follow-up to the incident in which a badminton racket stabbed a student in the buttocks at Tangshan Jinqiao School: Staff said that the teacher involved has been fired. "The school and the parents have negotiated to resolve the matter, and the teacher has been fired and resigned."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a group chat record of Peking Union Medical College Hospital was circulated online, stating that in view of the recent incidents in the country where a number of students have maliciously stabbed and injured their teaching teachers, in order to strengthen the safety management of our hospital and ensure the personal safety of teachers and students, substitute teachers are requested to remain vigilant during clinical teaching and not turn their backs to students.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 18, Melbourne, Australia. A Chinese student was chatting with a taxi driver. The driver said: You can say bad things about the government and no one will care because you are in Australia, but they (the Communist Party) will stay in power until they die. What kind of democracy is this? The student immediately retorted: "What you see on social media is not necessarily true. We are the ones who know our country best."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, in Guangxi, someone found a poster of Professor Zhong Nanshan on the roadside that had been smeared, and netizens flooded the comment area with comments like “Great job!”
